#summary DTGen release compatibility Oracle DB and APEX versions.

= Introduction =

DTGen runs on an Oracle database.  DTGen GUI runs on Oracle's Application Express in an Oracle database.

= Minimum Requirements =

|| *Database* || *Database<br>Edition* || *APEX<br>Vers* ||
|| Oracle10g || Any^1^ || 4.0 ||

|| *Browser* || Vers^2^ ||
|| Microsoft Internet Explorer || 7.0 ||
|| Mozilla Firefox || 3.5 ||
|| Google Chrome || 4.0 ||
|| Apple Safari || 4.0 ||

Note ^1^: Oracle Express Edition does not support Materialized View Logs<br>
Note ^2^: To view or develop Oracle Application Express applications, Web browsers must support Java Script and the HTML 4.0 and CSS 1.0 standards.

|| *Operating<br>System* || Rev || *Operating System<br>Edition* || Bits || *Database* || Rev || *Database<br>Edition* || Bits || *APEX<br>Vers* || *Browser* || Vers ||
|| Windows 7 || SP1 || Home Premium || 64 || Oracle10g || R2 || Express || 32 || 4.0 || Google Chrome || 18.0 ||
|| Windows XP || SP3 || Professional || 32 || Oracle11g || R2 || Express || 32 || 4.0 || Microsoft Internet Explorer || 8.0 ||
